text: Rachel Ames (born November 2, 1929) is an American television actress. She works mostly in soap operas. Ames played Audrey Hardy in the ABC soap General Hospital and its spinoff series Port Charles. She also played characters in other television series before General Hospital. Ames was born in Portland, Oregon. Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Portland, Oregon Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors
title: Rachel Ames
